p.k: Due to a very stale sexual relationship with her husband, Nicolette Shea has been having an affair with his friend, Scott Nails. After being once again left unsatisfied with the boring marital sex she's grown bored of, Nicolette makes up an excuse and sneaks over to Scott's for the hardcore type of sex she really craves. Scott, however, tries to convince her they shouldn't be fucking anymore, but Nicolette quickly changes his mind, leading to another steamy and intense adulterous sex session. But will Nicolette's husband finally catch on to what's been going on behind his back?
